name: Selective Retreats
overview:
Selective Retreats is an elite vacation rental company offering exclusive luxury villas, vacation homes, manors, chalets and castles in selected destinations around the world. From pristine beach locations to world class golf communities to snow-capped ski mountains to countryside wine vineyards, our accommodations are glamorous, sophisticated and include much opportunities for adventures and relaxation. Our concept allows for only a single group of vacationers to be housed at the properties during their stay, guaranteeing all guests one-to-one service and utter privacy. The properties generally include a certified professional team of butler, chef, valet and maid, kids’ nanny, and chauffeur. There is no absence of prominence at our properties, some villas even include complimentary resort membership for our guests to visit the hotel spa, gym, or involve the kids in playtime fun activities. Our properties cater to every desire, budget and lifestyle, and we have accommodations that are child safe, wheelchair friendly and suitable for the elderly and those with flexibility problems; families love our properties! Service attendants are well versed and trained in the true art of hospitality service, enacting the highest level of personal and professional care.

Our portfolio allows you to book properties in Bali, the Caribbean, Central America, France, Italy, Greece, Hawaii, Indian Ocean, South Pacific, Mexico, South Africa, Spain, Switzerland, Thailand, the United Kingdom, Canada (Whistler), and United States (Florida, California, Colorado, and Utah). You’ll appreciate the fact that we are knowledgeable about the vacation rental properties and their localities, weather you need information about the layout and architecture of the residence building, images of the surrounding area, list of featured amenities and services being offered, or expert advice on local establishments in the area such as restaurants or details for events, when should you visit or where to shop, know that we are equipped with the details you are likely to need and are eager to share them with you.

See Our Website: http://www.selectiveretreats.com/
